# AI Unfiltered - Full Article List

> This file contains recent AI news articles for consumption by LLMs and AI agents.
> Updated every 4 hours. Links to original sources.


## 2025-12-31

### Shai-Hulud Supply Chain Attack Led to $8.5 Million Trust Wallet Heist
- Source: Security Week
- Category: security
- URL: https://www.securityweek.com/shai-hulud-supply-chain-attack-led-to-8-5-million-trust-wallet-heist/
- Summary: The worm exposed Trust Wallet’s Developer GitHub secrets, allowing attackers to publish a backdoor extension and steal funds from 2,520 wallets. The post Shai-Hulud Supply Chain Attack Led to $8.5 Million Trust Wallet Heist appeared first on SecurityWeek.

It might be evoked by the sight of a sunset or a moody, low-key album. &#160; If...

### Alibaba Open-Sources MAI-UI GUI Agent: From 2B to 235B Models with End-Cloud Collaboration Boosting Success Rate 33%

- Summary: Alibaba’s Tongyi Lab open-sources MAI-UI GUI agent in 2B to 235B variants, with end-cloud collaboration boosting task success by 33% and enabling cross-app, privacy-focused interactions for AI terminals.

- Source: Pandaily
- Category: chinese-ai
- URL: https://pandaily.com/tencent-hunyuan-open-sources-translation-model-1-5-runs-on-1-gb-phone-memory-outperforms-commercial-ap-is
- Summary: Tencent Hunyuan open-sources Translation Model 1.5 in 1.8B and 7B variants, with the smaller version running on 1GB phone memory for offline real-time translation, outperforming commercial APIs.

### China Adds Multiple New Robot Tariff Codes in 2026 Tariff Adjustment
- Source: Pandaily
- Category: chinese-ai
- URL: https://pandaily.com/china-adds-multiple-new-robot-tariff-codes-in-2026-tariff-adjustment
- Summary: China’s 2026 tariff adjustment introduces new codes for intelligent bionic robots (0% MFN rate) and two types of cleaning robots, aiming to support the robotics industry while maintaining trade controls.

- Summary: Qingtianzhu launches a “1 RMB Flash Rental” service for humanoid robots, now open for reservations in 10 major Chinese cities with unified scheduling for multi-scenario deployment.

- Summary: AI biopharma leader InSilico Medicine made a stellar debut on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, raising US$294M in the year's largest biotech IPO there. Its shares surged 42% on the first day, valuing the company at over US$2.4 billion.
